sentences.en: A cyberjazz blend of alien voices, ambient textures and extraterrestrial grooves.
sentences.cn: 译:一种外星的声音, 混合着本星系和外星系的神秘音符.

sentences.en: A small round granule of extraterrestrial origin found embedded in some meteorites.
sentences.cn: 一些陨石中发现的细小微粒(如贵橄榄石微粒).

sentences.en: Extraterrestrial life represents an enormous gap in our knowledge of nature.
sentences.cn: 太空是否存在生命,这是我们对自然认识上的空白.

sentences.en: For those who hanker after extraterrestrial life that is a pity.
sentences.cn: 这对那些热衷外星生物的人来说或多或少有些遗憾.

sentences.en: Generally thinking, microspherulites are of both extraterrestrial and terrestrial origins.
sentences.cn: 一般认为微球粒有地外和地内两种成因.

sentences.en: In going through the earth's atmosphere the light from an extraterrestrial bodies suffers considerable absorption.
sentences.cn: 从地球以外的所有星体射来的光,在通过地球大气时,都会遭受很大的吸收.

sentences.en: NASA has started a 10-year search for extraterrestrial intelligence.
sentences.cn: 美国航空航天局已经启动了一个为期10年的寻找外星生物的项目。

sentences.en: One theory about the existence of extraterrestrial life rests on the presence of carbon compounds in meteorites.
sentences.cn: 地球外存在生命的理论是基于陨星上存在碳化合物质这一事实的.

sentences.en: Soon after his career went stratospheric, Jackson went extraterrestrial.
sentences.cn: 不久之后他的职业生涯进入了平流层, 杰克逊去了“外星球”.

sentences.en: The extraterrestrial would say we all speak dialects of one common language.
sentences.cn: 这位外星人会觉得,我们都在讲一种语言中的不同方言.

sentences.en: The nature and extent of official extraterrestrial disclosure is unclear.
sentences.cn: 公开的内容和程度还不清楚.

sentences.en: The search for extraterrestrial intelligence is a search for ourselves.
sentences.cn: 寻找陌生的智慧就是寻找自己的智慧.

sentences.en: The Search for Extraterrestrial Intelligence is now moving into a higher gear.
sentences.cn: 查寻地球外的智力现在搬入高速.

sentences.en: They claimed that they had been in contact with extraterrestrial beings.
sentences.cn: 他们声称在同外星人保持联络.

sentences.en: You must understand how to discern the extraterrestrial energies.
sentences.cn: 你们必须懂得如何辨别宇宙的能量.

trans.tran_cn: 地球外的，地球大气圈外的
trans.tran_en: relating to things that exist outside the Earth
